mapper.select: INSERT INTO product (product_id, product_lcategory, product_scategory, product_name,product_fullName,product_color, product_size, product_material, product_season, product_price, product_point, product_regdate, product_imagePath )VALUES(#{product_id},#{product_lcategory}, #{product_scategory}, #{product_name}, #{product_fullName}, #{product_color}, #{product_size}, #{product_material}, #{product_season}, #{product_price}, #{product_point}, SYSDATE, #{product_imagePath})
